name: Shared
description:
Game for the min-games jam

Play:

WASD - move 

Q - change into a box

Space - Night Vision

Art by Kenny

Sound from my collection

Theme
Magic
Special Object
A Bottle

My idea was to create a theft game that you need to collect starts of a broken bottle of Merlin from King Arthur’s days. but all the I was able to get done with the basic games play .

Story

You are agent X759 - you have been tasked with collecting all the shards and to bring them to Green corporation.

You have been brought from the past (2022) and you need to save 2077. Time travel is banned going backwards, but this is a work around so you can’t affect your own timeline. If you die or get caught, they will just repull/respawn you from the past.

Your DNA is coded so that you can transmute into a box to avoid detection. You can only do this a certain number of times.

The shards were broken up into pieces. They were originally from Merlin in King Arthur’s days. It can be used to purify water. Over the centuries they were broken into shards and spread over the World. The reason is lost to the sands of time.
